attributes.action: Increase business mileage allowance payments which are too low.
attributes.background: Business mileage rates are in two bands.  The first 10,000 miles for cars is 45p per mile and for after 10,000 miles it is 25p.  Twelve years ago the rates were 40p and 25p.  This small increase in just one of the bands does not reflect the real running costs and recent increases of fuel.
